Projects

Alexandira

The Library of Alexandira in Alexandria, Egypt, was one of the largest and most significant libraries of the ancient world. Alexandria was considered the capital of knowledge and learning, in part because of the Great Library. The library was part of a larger research institution called the Musaeum of Alexandria, where many of the most famous thinkers of the ancient world studied.

The burning of the Library of Alexandria, including the incalculable loss of ancient works, has become a symbol of the irretrievable loss of public knowledge.

The Trinkler Github repository Alexandira is an attempt to rebuild a digital version of this library for everything blockchain related.
